findings.label: Transactions With Supplier Name Withheld
findings.detail: £1M in payments where the supplier name is listed as 'NAME WITHHELD'. That's 7.4% of all transactions — citizens cannot scrutinise who receives this money.

findings.label: Capita Outsourcing Contract
findings.detail: Capita Business Services Ltd is the single largest supplier. Compare with Liberata at Burnley (£36.7M) and Pendle (£16.7M) — Rossendale appears to outsource significantly less.

findings.label: Agency Staff (Rapid Recruit)
findings.detail: 1,529 transactions to Rapid Recruit Ltd averaging £1,255 each — the most frequent commercial supplier. Review whether permanent recruitment would be more cost-effective.

findings.label: COVID/BEIS Grant Pass-Through
findings.detail: 2021/22 was the peak year (£21.3M) due to COVID Business Grants and BEIS funding. Underlying annual spend is £12-14M — lowest of the 4 East Lancashire councils.

findings.label: Year-End Spending Pattern
findings.detail: March spending is flat at 1.1x the monthly average. No evidence of year-end budget rush. April-June is actually the peak spending period.

key_findings.title: 3,167 transactions with supplier name withheld — £1M total
key_findings.description: 7.4% of all transactions list the supplier as 'NAME WITHHELD'. This prevents public scrutiny of who receives council money. Unique to Rossendale among the 4 East Lancashire councils.

key_findings.title: Capita Business Services: £5.8M outsourcing contract
key_findings.description: Primary outsourced services provider — similar role to Liberata at Burnley (£36.7M) and Pendle (£16.7M). Rossendale's outsourcing spend is significantly lower.

key_findings.title: Rapid Recruit: 1,529 agency staff transactions totalling £1.9M
key_findings.description: The most frequent commercial supplier. Averaging £1,255 per transaction suggests daily or weekly agency worker charges.

key_findings.title: 12,906 micro-transactions under £100 (30% of all payments)
key_findings.description: Banner Business Solutions (stationery) alone accounts for 1,019 transactions averaging £35. Consolidation could reduce admin costs.

key_findings.title: Lowest underlying spend of 4 councils at £12-14M per year
key_findings.description: After removing COVID pass-through funding, Rossendale's annual spend is significantly lower than Burnley, Hyndburn, or Pendle.

key_findings.title: Capita vs Liberata: different outsourcing providers, similar services
key_findings.description: Rossendale uses Capita (£5.8M) where Burnley and Pendle use Liberata (£36.7M and £16.7M). Worth comparing service scope and value.
